title: l'Angolo Della Pizza
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Beware that this place offers kebabs and is primarily meat and dairy based, but it does have a few lacto-veg pizzas. Vegans say "no cheese," and the kitchen will accommodate. Note: in Venice most pizzerias can make vegan pizza if you ask for no cheese.
